0.1.0.name: connect20/Buzzthemes_Digital_World_Template
0.1.0.description: Digital World is a Magento Template designed for electronic, camera, mobile and computer stores. This is another design following simple style. A harmony combination between light blue and grey makes the template friendly and help it highlights products and website content.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
